cause.description:
This cause is dedicated to peaceful co-existance and communication between the individuals, religious/political groups, and nations on our beautiful earth.
1. Nuclear Weapons must represent an era of the past, and become a symbol of the kinds of violece we need not in our conscience.
2. International Law needs to become more important to each nation.
3. Women need to become more influential in our global politics.
4. War itself needs be a crime punishable by an international court.
cause.mission: To create a more peaceful world where violent resolutions are seen as politically detestable options, and where our global connections are used to maintain healthy worldwide relationships.
cause.name: Pieces of Peace
